name: oppccat

stmt.origin: simpld(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccid, c1), cfv(ccid, c0)))
stmt.pretty: simpld(c0 ∈ Cat, c1 ∈ Cat, (Id ` c1)=(Id ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wa(wcel(c1, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccid, c1), cfv(ccid, c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Cat → c1 ∈ Cat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Cat →(c1 ∈ Cat ∧(Id ` c1)=(Id ` c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wa(wcel(c1, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccid, c1), cfv(ccid, c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Cat → c1 ∈ Cat)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Cat →(c1 ∈ Cat ∧(Id ` c1)=(Id ` c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wa(wcel(c1, ccat), wceq(cfv(ccid, c1), cfv(ccid, c0))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppc, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Cat →(c1 ∈ Cat ∧(Id ` c1)=(Id ` c0)))
⊣ c1 =(oppCat ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccat), wcel(c1, ccat))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppc, c0))

comment: An opposite category is a category. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
